test_cases.name: Partial name search works
test_cases.expected: John Smith appears in results

test_cases.name: 2 character search ignored
test_cases.expected: No search triggered, shows all patients

test_cases.name: Misspelled name fuzzy match
test_cases.expected: Smith patients appear with fuzzy matching

test_cases.name: No results found
test_cases.expected: Shows 'No patients found' message

test_cases.name: Special characters in search
test_cases.expected: Search executes safely, no XSS, shows no results

test_cases.name: Search performance under 500ms
test_cases.expected: Results appear within 500ms

test_cases.name: Clear search button
test_cases.expected: Search cleared, all patients visible again

test_cases.name: Exact MRN match
test_cases.expected: Single patient with exact MRN returned

test_cases.name: Partial MRN search
test_cases.expected: Shows patients with MRN starting with 'MRN12'

test_cases.name: MRN not found
test_cases.expected: Shows 'No patient found' message

test_cases.name: Auto-detect MRN vs Name
test_cases.expected: System auto-switches to MRN search mode

test_cases.name: Numeric-only MRN search
test_cases.expected: Searches both MRN and potentially numeric names

test_cases.name: Name match highlighted
test_cases.expected: 'Smi' portion highlighted in yellow in result

test_cases.name: MRN match highlighted
test_cases.expected: 'MRN123' portion highlighted

test_cases.name: Case-insensitive highlighting
test_cases.expected: 'Smith' highlighted despite case difference

test_cases.name: Multiple matches in name
test_cases.expected: Both 'an' in Anna and 'An' in Anderson highlighted

test_cases.name: No highlight for non-matching columns
test_cases.expected: Only Name column has highlight, not MRN or other fields

test_cases.name: Filter by F1 tier
test_cases.expected: Only F1 tier patients shown, count badge updated

test_cases.name: Multi-select F1 and F2
test_cases.input: Select both F1 and F2 filters
test_cases.expected: Shows F1 and F2 patients combined

test_cases.name: Filter with 0 results
test_cases.input: Select T5 when no T5 patients exist
test_cases.expected: Shows empty state, count shows 0

test_cases.name: Clear all filters
test_cases.expected: All filters cleared, all patients shown

test_cases.name: Count badge accuracy
test_cases.input: 3 F1 patients, 5 F2 patients in database
test_cases.expected: F1 button shows (3), F2 shows (5)

test_cases.name: Filter by MAC measure
test_cases.expected: Only patients on cholesterol meds shown

test_cases.name: Filter by MAD measure
test_cases.expected: Only patients on diabetes meds shown

test_cases.name: Filter by MAH measure
test_cases.expected: Only patients on hypertension meds shown

test_cases.name: Multi-measure patient appears once
test_cases.input: Patient on both MAC and MAD meds, both filters active
test_cases.expected: Patient appears once (not duplicated)

test_cases.name: Measure count accuracy
test_cases.expected: Buttons show correct counts for each

test_cases.name: Filter by Passing (>=80%)
test_cases.expected: Only patients with PDC >= 80% shown

test_cases.name: Filter by At-Risk (60-79%)
test_cases.expected: Only patients with PDC 60-79% shown

test_cases.name: Filter by Failing (<60%)
test_cases.expected: Only patients with PDC < 60% shown

test_cases.name: PDC exactly 80% boundary
test_cases.input: Patient with PDC=80, Passing filter active
test_cases.expected: Patient appears in Passing (80% is >= 80)

test_cases.name: PDC exactly 60% boundary
test_cases.input: Patient with PDC=60, At-Risk filter active
test_cases.expected: Patient appears in At-Risk (60% is in 60-79 range)

test_cases.name: N/A PDC patients
test_cases.input: D0/D1 patient with no PDC, any filter active
test_cases.expected: D0/D1 patients may be excluded or shown separately

test_cases.name: Candidates filter
test_cases.expected: Patients needing refill soon (7-14 days) shown

test_cases.name: Urgent filter
test_cases.expected: Patients with <= 7 days to runout shown

test_cases.name: Overdue filter
test_cases.expected: Patients with <= 0 days to runout shown

test_cases.name: Quick filter clears other filters
test_cases.input: F1 filter active, click Urgent quick filter
test_cases.expected: F1 cleared, Urgent applied

test_cases.name: No urgent patients
test_cases.input: Click Urgent when all patients have > 7 days
test_cases.expected: Shows empty state with appropriate message
